en.title: [2024] Human Development Index
en.description: Annual HDI indices for Malaysia, including sub-indices for life expectancy, years of schooling, and GNI per capita.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest Human Development Index (HDI) for Malaysia, including sub-indices for life expectancy, years of schooling, and GNI per capita.

bm.title: [2024] Indeks Pembangunan Manusia
bm.description: Indeks HDI tahunan bagi Malaysia, termasuk subindeks bagi jangkaan hayat, tahun persekolahan, serta PNK per kapita.
bm.description_email: DOSM baru sahaja menerbitkan Indeks Pembangunan Manusia (HDI) terkini bagi Malaysia merangkumi subindeks bagi jangkaan hayat, tahun persekolahan, serta PNK per kapita.
